Customer_ContractObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Customer_ContractObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Customer_ContractObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Customer Contract reference for which the Change Order is requested.

Customer_Contract_Line_Change_Order_Data.description: Change Order Type reference for the Customer Contract line.
Quantity for the Customer Contract line.
Quantity 2 for the Customer Contract line.
Change Order Amount for the Customer Contract line.
Notes for the Customer Contract line.

Customer_Contract_Change_Order_Data.description: Element containing details for Customer Contract Line for the Change Order request.

validation.validation: Quantity 2 can only be entered if the Contract Line Type is Fixed Amount or Subscription.
validation.description: Quantity 2 can only be entered if the Contract Line Type is Fixed Amount or Subscription.

validation.validation: Quantity cannot be entered for contract line types of: Prepaid, Recurring, Revenue Only, or Project based.
validation.description: Quantity cannot be entered for contract line types of: Prepaid, Recurring, Revenue Only, or Project based.

validation.validation: You have duplicate contract line: [contract line]
You can't enter a value in the Quantity 2 field on a contract line where the sales item requires fulfillment.
validation.description: You can't enter a value in the Quantity 2 field on a contract line where the sales item requires fulfillment.

validation.validation: Change Order Amount cannot be entered for Prepaid or Revenue Only contract lines.
validation.description: Change Order Amount cannot be entered for Prepaid or Revenue Only contract lines.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.
